summary: Archival footage, animation, and music are used to look back at the eight anti-war protesters who were put on trial following the 1968 Democratic National Convention.
cast: Hank Azaria|Dylan Baker|Nick Nolte|Mark Ruffalo|Roy Scheider|Liev Schreiber|Jeffrey Wright|Debra Eisenstadt|Lloyd Floyd|Ebon Moss-Bachrach|James Urbaniak|Leonard Weinglass|David Boat|Catherine Curtin|Julian Rebolledo|Daniel Hagen|Roger Jackson|Ted Marcoux|Chuck Montgomery|Christopher Murney|Phillip Piro|Jay Potter|Reg Rogers|John Rubano|Amy Ryan|Walter Cronkite|Richard M. Daley|Rennie Davis|David Dellinger|John Froines|Allen Ginsberg|Azadeh Hashemkhani|Tom Hayden|Abbie Hoffman|Lyndon B. Johnson|Paul Krassner|William Kunstler|Jerry Rubin|Ed Sanders|Bobby Seale|Samantha Sherman|Lee Weiner|Megan Armitage
title: Chicago 10
